name: Chillchat
introduce: Chillchat is a pixel art NFT metaverse, a vast collection of virtual worlds, made entirely by its players, where everyone can jump into adventure with a new identity. Before early 2021, Chillchat is an iOS gaming company, developing a 2D social game. The main driver for this project was a pixel art editor, allowing players to create artwork, characters, or setpieces.
